title: AIKa Zero
synopsis: Aika's story continues, she is now 19 years-old, 3 years older than in R-16 and 7 younger than in Agent AIKa. Strange phenomena have been occuring at a girls academy. Slowly but persistently the most cute and beautiful girls are joining an internal club, but instead of a sing-in they just get abducted by a strange being that takes control over them by some indecent means.
related_anime: ['AIKa R-16: Virgin Mission', 'AIKa', 'AIKa Zero Picture Drama']
